sentences.en: It goes whoosh up and whoosh down!
sentences.cn: 过山车呼一下上来了,呼一下又下去了!

sentences.en: Mommy Duck grabbed Chicken - feather Duckand out the door they went in a whoosh.
sentences.cn: 鸭妈妈急匆匆地牵着鸡毛鸭的小手出门了.

sentences.en: No, no. It was a whoop, whoop, whoop ! - How about this: Whoosh! - Yikes! Who said that?
sentences.cn: 不, 不. 是呜噗, 呜噗, 呜噗!-这个怎么样: 呜嘘! - 恶心! 谁说的?

sentences.en: She picked it up and pulled out cork. Whoosh! A puff of smoke appeared.
sentences.cn: 她拾起瓶子,拔掉软木塞. 嗤, 一股烟雾冒了出来.

sentences.en: Then came the riders amid even louder cheers and whoosh! It was all over.
sentences.cn: 在更大的欢呼声中骑手们冲过来了，只听呼的一声，就全部飞奔而过！

sentences.en: They drove home with their windshield wipers going whoosh whoosh.
sentences.cn: 他们驱车回家，一路上挡风玻璃上的雨刮器不停地呼呼刮着。

sentences.en: Whoosh! The straw house falls down.

words.tran_cn: 呼；（飞速行进等发出的声音）嗖
飞快地移动；发出嘶嘶声
